member.summary: Represents a class for performing sum, subtraction, and multiplication operations.

member.summary: Counts the summation of two values and outputs the result of the operation.

member.name: M:MyCalculator.CalculatorMethods.Division(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Counts the division of two values and outputs the result of the operation.

A double precision floating-point number. Can not be zero.
